member.summary: Implementation of David Blackman's GJrand PRNG(s)

member.param: Array of 64 bit unsigned integer with minimum length of 4.

member.name: T:Litdex.Security.RNG.PRNG.JSF32
member.summary: Implementation of a Bob Jenkins Small Fast (Noncryptographic) PRNGs.

member.name: T:Litdex.Security.RNG.PRNG.JSF64
member.summary: Implementation of a Bob Jenkins Small Fast (Noncryptographic) PRNGs.

member.name: T:Litdex.Security.RNG.PRNG.MiddleSquareWeylSequence
member.summary: Improved version from Middle Square Method, invented by John Von Neumann.

member.name: T:Litdex.Security.RNG.PRNG.PcgRxsMXs64
member.summary: A Permuted Congruential Generator (PCG) that is composed of a 64-bit Linear Congruential Generator(LCG) combined with the RXS-M-XS (random xorshift; multiply; xorshift) output transformation to create 64-bit output.

member.name: T:Litdex.Security.RNG.PRNG.PcgXshRr32
member.summary: A Permuted Congruential Generator (PCG) that is composed of a 64-bit Linear Congruential Generator (LCG) combined with the XSH-RR (xorshift; random rotate) output transformation to create 32-bit output.

member.name: T:Litdex.Security.RNG.PRNG.PcgXshRs32
member.summary: A Permuted Congruential Generator (PCG) that is composed of a 64-bit Linear Congruential Generator (LCG) combined with the XSH-RS (xorshift; random shift) output transformation to create 32-bit output.

member.name: T:Litdex.Security.RNG.PRNG.RomuDuo
member.summary: Romu random variations, might be faster than due to using fewer registers, but might struggle with massive jobs. Est. capacity = 2^61 bytes. Register pressure = 5. State size = 128 bits.

member.name: M:Litdex.Security.RNG.PRNG.RomuDuo.#ctor(System.UInt64[])
member.exception: Seed need 2 numbers.

member.name: T:Litdex.Security.RNG.PRNG.RomuDuoJr
member.summary: Romu random variations, the fastest generator using 64-bit arith., but not suited for huge jobs. Est. capacity = 2^51 bytes. Register pressure = 4. State size = 128 bits.

member.name: M:Litdex.Security.RNG.PRNG.RomuDuoJr.#ctor(System.UInt64[])
member.exception: Seed need 2 numbers.

member.name: T:Litdex.Security.RNG.PRNG.RomuMono32
member.summary: Romu random variations, 32-bit arithmetic: Suitable only up to 2^26 output-values. Outputs 16-bit numbers. Fixed period of (2^32)-47. Must be seeded using the romuMono32_init function. Capacity = 2^27 bytes. Register pressure = 2. State size = 32 bits.

member.name: T:Litdex.Security.RNG.PRNG.RomuQuad
member.summary: Romu random variations, more robust than anyone could need, but uses more registers than RomuTrio. Est. capacity >= 2^90 bytes. Register pressure = 8 (high). State size = 256 bits.

member.name: M:Litdex.Security.RNG.PRNG.RomuQuad.#ctor(System.UInt64[])
member.exception: Array of is null or empty.
Seed need 4 numbers.

member.name: T:Litdex.Security.RNG.PRNG.RomuQuad32
member.summary: Romu random variations, 32-bit arithmetic: Good for general purpose use. Est. capacity >= 2^62 bytes. Register pressure = 7. State size = 128 bits.

member.name: M:Litdex.Security.RNG.PRNG.RomuQuad32.#ctor(System.UInt32[])
member.exception: Seed need 4 numbers.

member.name: T:Litdex.Security.RNG.PRNG.RomuTrio
member.summary: Romu random variations, great for general purpose work, including huge jobs. Est. capacity = 2^75 bytes. Register pressure = 6. State size = 192 bits.

member.name: M:Litdex.Security.RNG.PRNG.RomuTrio.#ctor(System.UInt64[])
member.exception: Seed need 3 numbers.

member.name: T:Litdex.Security.RNG.PRNG.RomuTrio32
member.summary: Romu random variations, 32-bit arithmetic: Good for general purpose use, except for huge jobs. Est. capacity >= 2^53 bytes. Register pressure = 5. State size = 96 bits.

member.name: M:Litdex.Security.RNG.PRNG.RomuTrio32.#ctor(System.UInt32[])
member.exception: Seed need 3 numbers.

member.name: M:Litdex.Security.RNG.PRNG.Seiran.#ctor(System.UInt64[])
member.exception: Seed need 2 numbers.

member.name: M:Litdex.Security.RNG.PRNG.Seiran.Jump32
member.summary: Advance the internal state by 2^32 steps.
member.remarks: This method is equivalent to 2^32 calls. It can be executed in the same amount of time as 128 calls.

member.name: M:Litdex.Security.RNG.PRNG.Seiran.Jump64
member.summary: Advance the internal state by 2^64 steps.
member.remarks: This method is equivalent to 2^64 calls. It can be executed in the same amount of time as 128 calls.

member.name: M:Litdex.Security.RNG.PRNG.Seiran.Jump96
member.summary: Advance the internal state by 2^96 steps.
member.remarks: This method is equivalent to 2^96 calls. It can be executed in the same amount of time as 128 calls.

member.name: M:Litdex.Security.RNG.PRNG.Seiran.Previous
member.summary: Rewinds the internal state to the previous state.

member.name: T:Litdex.Security.RNG.PRNG.SFC32
member.summary: Implementation of Small, Fast, Counting (SFC) 32-bit generator of Chris Doty-Humphrey. The original source is the PractRand test suite

member.exception: Array of is null or empty.

member.name: T:Litdex.Security.RNG.PRNG.Xoroshiro128Plus
member.summary: Xoroshiro128+ PRNG is improved from Xoroshift128.

member.name: M:Litdex.Security.RNG.PRNG.Xoroshiro128Plus.NextJump
member.summary: 2^64 calls to NextLong(), it can be used to generate 2^64 non-overlapping subsequences for parallel computations.

member.name: M:Litdex.Security.RNG.PRNG.Xoshiro256Plus.#ctor(System.UInt64[])
member.exception: Array of seed is null or empty.
Seed length lower than 4.

member.name: M:Litdex.Security.RNG.PRNG.Xoshiro256Plus.NextJump
member.summary: This is the jump function for the generator. It is equivalent to 2^128 calls to next(); it can be used to generate 2^128 non-overlapping subsequences for parallel computations.

member.name: M:Litdex.Security.RNG.PRNG.Xoshiro256PlusPlus.#ctor(System.UInt64[])
member.exception: Array of seed is null or empty.
Seed length lower than 4.

member.name: M:Litdex.Security.RNG.PRNG.Xoshiro512Plus.NextJump
member.summary: This is the jump function for the generator. It is equivalent to 2^256 calls to next(); it can be used to generate 2^256 non-overlapping subsequences for parallel computations.

member.name: T:Litdex.Security.RNG.Random32
member.summary: Base class for Random Number Generator that the internal state produces 32 bit output.

member.name: M:Litdex.Security.RNG.Random32.RotateLeft(System.UInt32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Rotates the specified value left by the specified number of bits.
member.param: The number of bits to rotate by. Any value outside the range [0..63] is treated as congruent mod 64.

member.summary: Rotates the specified value right by the specified number of bits.
member.param: The number of bits to rotate by. Any value outside the range [0..63] is treated as congruent mod 64.

member.exception: Array of seed is null or empty.

member.summary: Rotates the specified value left by the specified number of bits.
